abstract: DealBook has been summarizing the most interesting exhibits from the S.E.C.’s Madoff report. Readers are invited to help us by sorting through the documents themselves and posting interesting findings in the comments.
snippet: DealBook has been summarizing the most interesting exhibits from the S.E.C.’s Madoff report. Readers are invited to help us by sorting through the documents themselves and posting interesting findings in the comments.
lead_paragraph: Update | Nov. 1, 2:10 p.m. Hundreds of exhibits were released Friday in the Securities and Exchange Commission’s internal investigation into why the agency failed to detect Bernard L. Madoff‘s enormous Ponzi scheme despite numerous warnings. Among the exhibits is an interview with Mr. Madoff himself, which is discussed in detail in this article from The New York Times.

headline.main: Take a Closer Look at the S.E.C. Madoff Exhibits
